execution_quality: High-quality execution with no errors. The agent methodically located relevant components, understood the existing code patterns, and implemented the toggle feature cleanly across the necessary files.
work_category: UI enhancement task adding an eye/crossed-out-eye icon toggle next to an edit button to control item visibility. The agent used search and read operations to understand the codebase structure, then made targeted edits to implement the feature.
summary: The agent successfully implemented a local eye-icon visibility toggle next to the edit button as requested, using efficient codebase navigation and targeted edits. The user's follow-up message proposing a global state implementation indicates satisfaction with the work and a desire to expand its scope, demonstrating the agent's execution matched the initial intent precisely.
follow_up_pattern: User immediately provided an expanded architectural request building on the completed work, indicating satisfaction with the implementation and desire to evolve it further. This suggests the toggle works correctly and the user wants to refactor its scope to be global rather than local.
